Mind Magic:Mental Manipulation: Use your magices to alter the minds of the world to see things your way.
Your powers let you shape the very perception of reality!
Shift the opinion of characters, make them love you, hate you, worship you, or make them feel so towards another.
A most powerful and delicate art, subtly shift the core personality of another.
Shift the opinion of characters, with respect of you.
Shift the opinion of characters, with respect to another.
Manipulate the direct opinion another has of you, culminating with binding their loyalty.
Make the subject your friend, enemy or lover.
Having taken control of the subjects mind, it is within your powers to force their action.
Manipulate the direct opinion another has of the object of fixation, culminating with binding their loyalty.
Make the subject the object of fixation's, friend, enemy or lover.
Having taken control of the subjects mind, it is within your powers to force their action with respect to the object of fixation.
Add a personality trait to the target
Remove a personality trait from the target
